name: Nightcrawler Geisha | A CY_BORG Class
description:
An assassin class inspired by the geisha robots in Ghost in the Shell.

Nightcrawler Geisha is an independent production by Alessandro and is not affiliated with Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the CY_BORG Third Party License.
